**Tender Announcement: Customized Trauma Medical Course**
==============================

### Tender Number
PW-23-01029637

### Notice Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide customized trauma medical courses using Body Worn Trauma Training Suits. The course will focus on trauma care based on the United States' Committee on Tactical Combat Casualty Care (CoTCCC) and the Canadian Combat Casualty Care Working Group (CCCWG).

### Objective
The objective of this project is to provide RCMP Emergency Medical Response Team (EMRT) members and RCMP specialty unit members with advanced training in trauma care using Body Worn Trauma Training Suits. The training will simulate real-world scenarios and provide a field experience where participants can gain confidence in integrating medical procedures with police tactics.

### Requirements
The contractor must provide:

* Trauma medical courses in accordance with CoTCCC and CoTECC procedures and guidelines
* Training material and documentation
* Body Worn Trauma Training Suits
* Scenario effects (special effects, simulated Body Worn Improvised Explosive Device, simulated sniper/Gun, smoke machine, and smell effect)
* Required equipment and personal protective gear

### Criteria for Assessment
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of statement of capabilities that its courses and resources meet the following requirements:

* Knowledge of TCCC material and experience in delivering comparable training to military or law enforcement personnel
* Provision of Clinical Instructors, Instructors, and Role Players that meet the requirements outlined in the tender document

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Revised World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and various other trade agreements.

### Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods and services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date.

### Contact Information
For inquiries and statements of capabilities, please contact:
Michelle Allen, Senior Procurement Officer
343-572-4945
Michelle.allen@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
